title: nIkE nivEdanamurA
sahitya:
nIkE nivEdanamurA hE paramAtmA nEnu nAtiyanu mAnavatva mantA


anupallavi

  dEhAdhyAsamaina mOhamunuvatili sOham shuddhOhamanE dAhamIyarA taNDri


caraNam    kannulO jUpunU gAna OmkAramunU karaNamu lOpala ganatara yOginU
ninnu nE viDavanu nannu nA viDavaku niratishayAnanda bharitA shubha caritA
